text: Nihsandeha yara abisbasa posana kare ara thekiye rakhe allahâ€Œra patha theke o pabitra masajida theke yake amara baniyechi sakala manusera jan'ya samanabhabe, -- sekhanakara basindara o bahiragatera jan'ya. Ara ye ke'u sekhane an'yayabhabe dhurtami karate caya take amara asbada karara marmantada sasti theke.
